skills.name: TREACHERY
desc: • Deals 3 hits of physical damage to a single target.
• 50% Chance to Steal a Beneficial Effect per hit.

skills.name: GOLDEN PARADISE
desc: • Heal amount is based on your ATK and MAX HP.
• Heal amount increases based on the number of beneficial effects on self.

skills.name: REVENGE
desc: 35% Chance to counterattack when an ally gets attacked.
